page.title: 17Rogart - Commercial
page.content: The Mackay family, "The Smiddy", Rogart, own an engineering business. The machines they own include tractors, a bulldozer, a low-loader, a J.C.B. and a peat turfer. They use their machines to build foundations of houses; dig drains in croft and farm land to improve their agricultural quality; build roads up to the final point where the surface requires the final tarring process and in the winter, they help to clear the snowdrifts from the roads. If you require a machine to be welded, the Mackays will try to help you. They are also fencing contractors. Most of their work is in the Rogart - Lairg area, but they can sometimes be found working all over Sutherland or in Caithness.
